committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey, without consideration, to the Nebraska Game and Parks Commission, approximately 160 acres of land within the Nebraska National Forest to be used for the purposes of expanding the Chadron State Park, Nebraska.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey, without consideration, to the Nebraska Game and Parks Commission all Federal rights to specified lands within the Nebraska National Forest in Dawes County, Nebraska. Reserves to the United States any gas, coal, oil and mineral rights in such lands and a right of reversion should the land not be used as part of Chadron State Park, Nebraska. Requires the Nebraska Game and Parks Commission to bear the costs incidental to such conveyance.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey, without consideration, to the Nebraska Game and Parks Commission, approximately 160 acres of land within the Nebraska National Forest to be used for the purposes of expanding the Chadron State Park, Nebraska.
